breads.name: Sourdough
breads.description: Sourdough A rustic loaf with a tangy twist. Naturally fermented for deep flavor. Crisp crust, chewy golden crumb. Perfect with butter, soup, or nothing at all.

breads.name: Baguette
breads.description: Baguette Golden, slender, and unmistakably French. Crackling crust meets airy interior. Baked fresh for that perfect snap. Ideal for sandwiches, spreads, or solo snacking.

breads.name: Ciabatta
breads.description: Ciabatta Italian-born with a rugged charm. Open crumb, flour-dusted crust. Soft, chewy, and full of character. Made for paninis, dipping, or devouring.

breads.name: Focaccia
breads.description: Focaccia Flat, fluffy, and rich with olive oil. Topped with herbs, tomatoes, or sea salt. Golden edges, pillowy center. A savory slice of Italian comfort.

breads.name: Multigrain
breads.description: Multigrain Packed with seeds, grains, and goodness. Nutty flavor, nourishing bite. Hearty crust with a tender crumb. Fuel for mornings, meals, and moments.

breads.name: Rye Bread
breads.description: Rye Bread Deep flavor with a hint of spice. Dense, hearty, and unmistakably rich. Perfect with deli meats or smoked salmon. A classic loaf with character.
